name: Martin Brundle
status: Retired (currently commentating for Sky Sports F1)
introduction: Full nameMartin BrundleOccupationCo-commentator (19972010, 2012present)  Lead commentator (2011)EmployerITV-F1 (19972008)  BBC Sport F1 (20092011)  Sky Sports F1 (2012present)Years active1997presentMartin Brundle is a retired Formula One racing driver who participated in F1 from 1984 until 1996. During his career, Brundle raced for Tyrrell, Zakspeed, Williams, Brabham, Benetton, Ligier, McLaren and the Jordan teams.
